mapper.select: SELECT le.id le_id,le.creationDate,le.content,le.infoId, u.id u_id,u.portyaitl,u.userName, r.id r_id,r.roleName,p.id p_id,p.prow, c.id c_id,c.city,co.id co_id,co.country FROM shoot_letter le INNER JOIN shoot_user u ON u.id=le.sendUserId INNER JOIN shoot_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot_address a ON a.id=u.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot_prow p ON p.id=a.prow_id INNER JOIN shoot_city c ON c.id=a.city_id INNER JOIN shoot_country co ON co.id=a.country_id WHERE (le.putUserId=#{putUserId} AND le.sendUserId=#{sendUserId}) OR (le.sendUserId=#{putUserId} AND le.putUserId=#{sendUserId}) order by le.creationDate desc

SELECT le.id le_id,le.creationDate,le.content,le.infoId, u.id u_id,u.portyaitl,u.userName, r.id r_id,r.roleName,p.id p_id,p.prow, c.id c_id,c.city,co.id co_id,co.country, i.id i_id,i.content i_content FROM shoot_letter le INNER JOIN shoot_user u ON u.id=le.sendUserId INNER JOIN shoot_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot_address a ON a.id=u.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot_prow p ON p.id=a.prow_id INNER JOIN shoot_city c ON c.id=a.city_id INNER JOIN shoot_country co ON co.id=a.country_id inner join shoot_info i on i.userId=u.id WHERE le.sendUserId=#{sendUserId} GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY le.creationDate ASC

SELECT le.id le_id,le.sendUserId, le.putUserId,le.creationDate,le.content,le.infoId, u.id u_id,u.portyaitl,u.userName,u.phone, r.id r_id,r.roleName,p.id p_id,p.prow, c.id c_id,c.city,co.id co_id,co.country FROM shoot.shoot_letter le INNER JOIN shoot.shoot_user u ON u.id=le.sendUserId INNER JOIN shoot.shoot_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot.shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot.shoot_address a ON a.id=u.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot.shoot_prow p ON p.id=a.prow_id INNER JOIN shoot.shoot_city c ON c.id=a.city_id INNER JOIN shoot.shoot_country co ON co.id=a.country_id WHERE le.sendUserId=#{sendUserId} AND le.putUserId=#{putUserId} and le.infoId=#{infoId} group by u.id order by le.creationDate desc

SELECT le.id le_id,le.sendUserId ,le.creationDate,le.content le_content,le.infoId, u.id u_id,u.portyaitl,u.userName,u.phone, r.id r_id,r.roleName,p.id p_id,p.prow, c.id c_id,c.city,co.id co_id,co.country, i.id i_id,i.content i_content,st.id st_id,st.costName, ty.id ty_id,ty.typeName FROM shoot_letter le INNER JOIN shoot_user u ON u.id=le.sendUserId INNER JOIN shoot_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot_address a ON a.id=u.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot_prow p ON p.id=a.prow_id INNER JOIN shoot_city c ON c.id=a.city_id INNER JOIN shoot_country co ON co.id=a.country_id inner join shoot_info i on i.id=le.infoId inner join shoot_cost st on st.id=i.costId inner join shoot_state ta on ta.id=i.stateId inner join shoot_type ty on ty.id=i.typeId WHERE le.putUserId=#{putUserId} and i.stateId=#{stateId} GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY le.creationDate ASC

SELECT le.id le_id,le.sendUserId ,le.creationDate,le.content le_content,le.infoId, u.id u_id,u.portyaitl,u.userName,u.phone, r.id r_id,r.roleName,p.id p_id,p.prow, c.id c_id,c.city,co.id co_id,co.country, i.id i_id,i.content i_content,st.id st_id,st.costName, ty.id ty_id,ty.typeName FROM shoot_letter le INNER JOIN shoot_user u ON u.id=le.sendUserId INNER JOIN shoot_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot_address a ON a.id=u.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot_prow p ON p.id=a.prow_id INNER JOIN shoot_city c ON c.id=a.city_id INNER JOIN shoot_country co ON co.id=a.country_id inner join shoot_info i on i.id=le.infoId inner join shoot_cost st on st.id=i.costId inner join shoot_state ta on ta.id=i.stateId inner join shoot_type ty on ty.id=i.typeId inner join shoot_order ro on ro.sendUserId=u.id WHERE le.putUserId=#{userId} and i.stateId=#{stateId} and ro.userId=#{userId} group by i.content ORDER BY le.creationDate ASC
